channel.title: How to change what special attk hits all the time
channel.description: well i wanna make whip hit certain stuff on spec, and normally it's hitDiff = 10; or w/e but in devo it doesnt seem to work lol tell me how please will reward with a rs2 mauler :P

item.title: How to change what special attk hits all the time
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

[quote=“Sabia, post:6, topic:313392”][quote author=0mg Noob link=topic=409894.msg3024379#msg3024379 date=1257805908]
lmao oh sorry guys was meant to click server help lol my bad

gonna try that now, i want it to hit on players too, what do i change there? :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2009, 04:36:00 pm[/size][hr]tried it and it doesn’t work, it’s weird, it’s like nothing can work lol
[/quote]

If you don’t know how to use the client.java than just edit the bonus of the weapon it will make it hit higher.[/quote]

No because then weapons become overpowered. and there is no playercombat.java.

this is devo 2.7…

item.title: How to change what special attk hits all the time
item.dc:creator: @mudboi222 mudboi222
item.description:
@mudboi222 wrote:

yes i do[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2009, 03:52:06 pm[/size][hr]go into ur client. on ur server the searc the wep code. then u will see sumthin like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10010 && specialAmount > 74){
stillgfx(370, EnemyY, EnemyX);
specialAtk(false, 75, 600, 2927);
getHit(0);
AttackingOn2.EntangleDelay = 0;
}

well thats were u change how much sp[ecial it uses but imm heres were u change how high it hits

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 3547);
npcDamage(50);
specGFX(655);
}

npcDamage(50);change the 50 to watever u want maxhit to be

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2009, 03:57:39 pm[/size][hr]and btw who cares if he posted in here maybe he wanted a quick reply…it dosent madder

Read full topic
